email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your recent inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, available for this route. The vessel has a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280 meters. The starting freight rate we’re quoting is in the low 50s, specifically $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, Thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were expecting. Would you be able to come down to the mid-40s? Also, could you confirm the laycan dates? Looking forward to your reply. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, Thanks for your feedback. I understand your concerns about the rate. After discussing with the owner, we can offer a revised rate of $48.50 per metric ton. The laycan dates are October 20th to October 25th. Let me know if this works for you. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $48.50 sounds more reasonable. We can proceed with this rate. Could you also provide details on the demurrage terms? Also, please confirm the vessel’s readiness for the laycan dates. Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, Great to hear that the rate works for you. The demurrage rate is set at $20,000 per day, pro-rata. The MV Ocean Star is currently on schedule and will be ready for loading within the agreed laycan dates. I’ll send over the charter party agreement for your review shortly. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, Thanks for the details. The demurrage terms are acceptable. Please go ahead and send the charter party agreement. We’ll review it and get back to you by end of day. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I’ve attached the charter party agreement for your review. Let me know if you have any questions or need further clarifications. Looking forward to finalizing this deal. Best regards, Sarah
